name: Shelter Monitoring Committee
description: The Shelter Monitoring Committee documents the conditions of shelters and resource centers to improve the health, safety, and treatment of residents, clients, staff, and the homeless community. It is an independent organization. The Shelter Monitoring Committee has 13 members. The Committee's mission is to undertake this work recognizing individual human rights and promoting a universal standard of care for shelters and resource centers in the City and County of San Francisco.
